name: William Pradere
content: Lilian quickly integrated into the team and was able to ramp up efficiently on the project he was assigned to. He demonstrates a strong sense of autonomy, while also seeking clarification when necessary. Curious and enthusiastic, he doesn't hesitate to question technical or functional choices thoughtfully, with a mindset focused on continuous improvement and a deep understanding of the topics at hand.

name: Test Po
content: Working with Lilian was an absolute pleasure throughout the entire project. As a developer, he showed great professionalism, a solid understanding of business needs, and the ability to provide effective, relevant solutions. His autonomy, rigor, and clear communication greatly contributed to the smooth progress and success of our collaboration.
